author: legoparent
title: Flo on Over to the Cafe
review:
Pixar Fans, and Cars Fans

Absolute must have.

 

I picked up one at Target, they are clearancing the sets, which do make it worth the price.

 

Surprising for the set and price, to have three cars characters, very happy about that.

Bold colors durable.

 

However there is one con.  When compared to the MegaBloks version of the cars sets.  The megabloks does appear to have more solid plastic, and a little more "character appeal".  So it will be interesting to see how Lego sets are in the Cars 2 series.

 

If you can get the set on clearance, GET IT!
